title: Ethylene glycol is metabolized to ethanol and acetate and induces expression of bacterial microcompartments in Propionibacterium freudenreichii
content:
Publication date: 15 July 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 13

Author(s): Alexander Dank, Yue Liu, Xin Wen, Fan Lin, Anne Wiersma, Sjef Boeren, Eddy J. Smid, Richard A. Notebaart, Tjakko Abee
